title: The affectionate shepheard Containing the complaint of Daphnis for the loue of Ganymede.
author: Barnfield, Richard, 1574-1627.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Danter for T. G[ubbin] and E. N[ewman] and are to bee sold in Saint Dunstones Church-yeard [sic] in Fleetstreet,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Library.
